Option.name: SkipComponentImport
Option.tip: Skip import and creation of discrete component designs

Option.name: UseMaxResolution
Option.tip: Calculate and use maximum resolution for given units and board size

Option.name: ArcResolution1000
Option.tip: Arc resolution

Option.name: LayerNumberOffset
Option.tip: Starting layer number for imported layers

Option.name: SkipTopDesignImport
Option.tip: Skip import of top level design

Option.name: VerboseLogging
Option.tip: Enable verbose information logging

Option.name: UseSquareCornerPaths
Option.tip: Force path corner type to square

Option.name: CellNameRefDesPrefix
Option.tip: Include RefDes prefix in cell name

Option.name: ReuseExistingExtractaFiles
Option.tip: Reuse existing extracta files rather than running extracta

Option.name: CreateEtchOnly
Option.tip: Import only metal (etch) features - ignore other layers

Option.name: DeleteExtractaFiles
Option.tip: Delete extracta output files after import

Option.name: SkipSubstrateImport
Option.tip: Skip import and creation of substrate

Option.name: PreserveEtchClassNames
Option.tip: Do not map all etch class names to ETCH

Option.name: CellNameDeviceType
Option.tip: Include device type in cell name

Option.name: LimitImportCount
Option.tip: Stop import after reaching limit object count

Option.name: ImportTechnologyOnly
Option.tip: Import technology only - skip layout and component import

Option.name: NoInteractive
Option.tip: No interactive features such as notification windows

Option.name: DisableNegativeLayerProcessing
Option.tip: Disable negative layer to positive layer conversion

Option.name: CellNamePartNumber
Option.tip: Include part number in cell name

Option.name: ImportIntoExistingLib
Option.tip: Import into an existing library

Option.name: CellNameComponentClass
Option.tip: Include component class in cell name

Option.name: MapNamesToLowerCase
Option.tip: Map map cell and view names to lower case

Option.name: CellNameValue
Option.tip: Include component value string in cell name

Option.name: CellNameTolerance
Option.tip: Include component tolerance string in cell name

Option.name: CellNameSequenceNumber
Option.tip: Include unique sequence number in cell name

Option.name: ShowDuplicateLogMessages
Option.tip: Show all log messages, including duplicates

Option.name: UseNetNameNone
Option.tip: Set empty and unconnected nets to _NONE

Option.name: CreateComponentFolder
Option.tip: Create a Folder Tab folder for imported components

Option.name: ConvertSubstrateUnits
Option.tip: Convert substrate units (if necessary) to match layout units
